title: Gathering Grounds
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small coffee and pastry cafe offering several ovo-lacto vegetarian items and a couple vegan choices (vegan burger though sometimes runs out and mandarin & pecan salad). The veg wrap can be made vegan by asking to omit cheese. Has soy milk for coffee drinks. Staff is helpful with verifying ingredients for diners.
